H0.text: Water is the substance composed of only one type of atom, as requested by the question "Which substance is composed of only one type of atom?"

H1.text: Gold is a substance composed of only one type of atom.

H2.text: Salt is a substance composed of only one type of atom.

H3.text: Sugar is a substance composed of only one type of atom.

A4.text: Gold has only one stable isotope, 197Au, which is also its only naturally occurring isotope, so gold is both a mononuclidic and monoisotopic element.

A5.text: Gold is a chemical element; it has chemical symbol Au (from Latin aurum) and atomic number 79.
